ing: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut in bite-sized pieces
2 (14.5 ounce) cans no-salt-added tomatoes, diced or crushed
1 (15 ounce) can no-salt-added black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup shredded reduced-fat Monterey Jack cheese
des: "Mexican flavors will make this chicken casserole a family favorite."
ins: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread rice in a shallow 3-quart casserole. Top with chicken. In a bowl, combine tomatoes, beans, corn, peppers, seasonings and garlic; pour over chicken. Top with cheese and optional jalapeno. Bake 45 minutes.
